item.description:
Love to play games? Join us on Monday evenings. We meet every Monday at 7:00pm. We play all kinds of games--party, strategy, card and board games--join a game or bring your own game to share. All players aged 18 to 80 are invited!
This meetup is part of the FAN Alliance. The FAN Alliance is a series of related general activities meetups. The FAN Alliance does not discriminate with the exception that you are expected to be an adult nor do we charge event or membership fees. The goal of this alliance is that it is a fun and safe environment for everyone. By joining you are implicitly agreeing to respect other members privacy. Both Singles and People in Committed Relationships are welcome!
Discuss this meetup here:
http://forums.delphiforums.com/organizers1/start
Click here for a list of Alliance Meetups:
http://socialnetwork.meetup.com/442/pages/Alliance/

topics_item.name: Tabletop Role Playing and Board Games

item.name: The Greater Nashua Gamers Meetup Group
